name: Lifeline (Lucas Teng, Amy HyruleHero, stephanie.grinton, the_tuxinator, angusfan, LittleRedGhoul)
name_original: Lifeline (Lucas Teng, Amy HyruleHero, stephanie.grinton, the_tuxinator, angusfan, LittleRedGhoul)
description:
Play as a recently deceased soul. Help protect your partner through the various stages of grief. 

Created for the GMTK Game Jam 2021.

Controls:

WASD/Arrow Keys - Movement

E/Enter - Call out

If you have problems with the in-browser version, please use the executable version!
